name: Guidos & Goblins RPG
description:
In a fantasy world loosely based on Providence, RI a cast of unlikely anti-heroes just may stay sober enough to save civilization from everything they deem wrong  with society in this silly, and often incredibly stupid, old school RPG. 

Controls:

Arrows: Walk around

'Z' or Enter: "Action" button, Talk, Search etc, Select(in menus) 

'X': Bring up main menu (be sure to save your game!) , go "back" in menus, in battle brings up the "Run away" option.

Hold down Shift while using arrows to walk faster (you can't do this everywhere.) 
or you can turn on "Auto Dash" in the Options menu. 

Also, almost everything can be done with a two button mouse but I wouldn't recommend it.
